data.message:
Please, I am hoping someone can help me. My sister passed away in February and I have tried memorializing her page. My mother and my sister's friends DO NOT need to be getting reminders of her upcoming birthday, etc. I do not want her page removed; I want it memorialized so those reminders and friend suggestions do not happen and cause my family pain. 

I have followed the instructions to memorialize her page about three or four times now and I get a message saying I will be emailed. However, I have never been emailed. PLEASE, I am trying to get this taken care of before my sister's birthday in August. PLEASE help me!

replies.message: Hi Nancy. Thank you for reaching out to us. We extend our deepest condolences to you and your family and appreciate your patience during this process. You may have the option to check the status of your request in the Support Dashboard here: http://on.fb.me/1pNbnH9 If can't see the request please let me know. - Kristen
guys can u help me to reactivate my prvius acc

Hi Kristen, the request to memorialize the account does not appear, but what does appear is a report I made on March 23 that something wasn't working on Facebook (the ability to memorialize an account). Please help! Thank you for your response!

wish I could help you but I had a daughter pass away july of last year suffered through her birthday.dont know how to get through july30.she left behind a 18 year old daughter,my granddaughter.lord if there is a answer I cant find it.sorry.
